name: Mall Empire
description: The Mall Empire allows you to build and manage the operations of a modern mall. You must plan where to place facilities in the tower that include restaurants, shops, rest areas, retail stores and elevators.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8, 8.1, 10 64-bit Processor: Intel Core I3 (or equivalent) and higher @ 2.2GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space
